page.title: 06LISTED BUILDINGS.WILDEN.
page.content:
The Parish of Wilden has to its credit ten 'Listed Buildings,' i.e. buildings which are listed by the Min. of Housing & Local Gvmnt as being of special architectural or historical interest. Nine of these are in the Block.
Grade 1. St. Nicholas Church. (of outstanding interest) Grade 3. Crowhill Farm House Tudor Cottage. Cottage S.E. of Tudor Cottage Manor Farm House Brook Farm House Lilac Cottage East End Farm House Lion Field Farm House. (Buildings considered important enough that the case for preserving them can be fully considered).
